description:
The #1 question I'm asked about Social Media is ...

"James ... but what do I write?"

Of course it's not just social media they ask about ... their questions include what to say on their blog, write in their email and yes ... what to post on Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter. They ask what images to share on Pinterest and Instagram, and what should they upload to YouTube and so on.

Frankly I'm always a little surprised when they ask as you'lI soon discover in this training the answer is simple: it's all about the 'message consumption context' and don't worry, I explain this and more, including the 3 critical MESSAGE STAGES and the 3 PSYCHOLOGICAL STATES that correspond to them.

  • TIP #1 It's all on the matrix schematic I mentioned in the preview video.
  • TIP #2 Success with social media comes from the psychology - not technology.

Complete with this new appreciation about the way people communicate in cycles (some say 'sales funnels') you'll begin to easily see how simple it is to answer the questions above.

Enrol in this course and I guarantee "no more page fright" about what to write, share or post on your social media, blog or in your email!

See you inside ... hurry, because I've got some amazing training to share with you.

~ James

March 2015
title: How To Develop Your Social Media Strategy, Templates & Tools
